pr_title: use appropriate serializer with correct documentation (bsc#1168083)

timeline.bodyText: I guess you forgot to remove SystemOverviewSerializer
timeline.author: admd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1897,9 +1898,10 @@ public int setGroupMembership(User loggedInUser, Integer sid, Integer sgid,
      * @xmlrpc.returntype
      *          #array_begin()
      *              $SystemOverviewSerializer
+     *              $ShortSystemInfoSerializer

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/frontend/xmlrpc/system/SystemHandler.java b/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/frontend/xmlrpc/system/SystemHandler.java
index 5973ccc4bfe..c37108dcfa3 100644
--- a/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/frontend/xmlrpc/system/SystemHandler.java
+++ b/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/frontend/xmlrpc/system/SystemHandler.java

@@ -1897,7 +1897,6 @@ public class SystemHandler extends BaseHandler {
      * @xmlrpc.param #param_desc("string", "login", "User's login name.")
      * @xmlrpc.returntype
      *          #array_begin()
-     *              $SystemOverviewSerializer
      *              $ShortSystemInfoSerializer
      *          #array_end()
      */

timeline.bodyText: We need to make the same changes for listActiveSystems methods and it's overloaded variants if there are.
